title: Couchsurfing will censor the content you upload at their sole discretion

tosdr.case: you are responsible for what you publish
tosdr.tldr:
"You are solely responsible for any Member Content that you submit, 
post or transmit via our Services. You agree not to post, upload to, 
transmit, distribute, store, create or otherwise publish through the 
Services, Member Content that we believe, in our sole discretion: 
(and then a list of reasons, like racism, nudity, drug use, copyright 
infringement, etc)

topics.name: Governance
topics.subtitle: Your relationship with the service and the community
topics.title: Governance

topics.description: Your account and your data are on their servers, so they control them. Which guarantee do you have that lawful content and lawful activity will not be censored or suspended?

topics.name: Suspension and Censorship
